WelcomeNote.title: Welcome to the Player Dashboard
WelcomeNote.intro: This dashboard is a community-driven project designed to provide statistics and insights into the player base of the game.
WelcomeNote.howText: The information is gathered using publicly available, third-party tools. Think of it like a periodic "in-game census"â€”a snapshot of the player data that is visible at a specific moment in time.
WelcomeNote.disclaimerP1_part1: To be crystal clear: this website
WelcomeNote.disclaimerP1_part2_important: does not connect to the live game servers
WelcomeNote.disclaimerP2: Think of this data like a photograph, not a live video. We take these "snapshots" of public player data periodically. This means the information is a delayed view, not a live feed of what is happening in the game right now.
WelcomeNote.disclaimerP3_part1: Therefore, this site is not affiliated with
